description: A round fragile clay vessel full of flammable liquid with a long fuse inserted, which can be thrown by hand, or used in a staff sling with a modified cradle.  To throw this item without a sling, use it light the fuse.  You will, of course, need a lighter or matches in your inventory to do this.  After lighting it, throw it to cause fires.
//: Total range with staff sling 21 - 5 more than can be thrown by a player with 10 strength.

description: A military-grade fragmentary hand grenade, prepared for use with a staff sling.  To throw it without using a staff sling, wield it and then activate it to pull the pin and prime the grenade.  You will then have 5 seconds to throw it before it explodes.

use_action.msg: You pull the pin on your %s.
